column4: sorry if this a n00b question, but I would like to compile (k)ubuntu on my pocket pc phone. is it possible?
I doubt it. Which are the hardware specifications of your "pocket pc phone"?
ubuntu doesn't support such processor so I doubt it will always compile ubuntu source packages.
*maybe* gcc (and the toolchain) can be configured to crosscompile to that processor, so you can compile your packages on your pc and upload them to your pc phone
